Room.Name: Dark Clouds
Room.ShortDescription: You are flying over the mouth of Tasletek Gorge. 50.n5.e1.s0.w0
Room.LongDescription: The dark clouds turn to an even darker looking fog down below in the gorge. From time to time, through patches in the terrible mist you can see the dark river and sharp rocks. The end of the gorge is to the southeast.
